page.title: 20A DAY IN MY LIFE N.MARSHALL
page.content: 7.00am thats when my mum comes in singing "Oh what a beautiful morning". I drag myself out of bed,get washed and go for my breakfast,a drink of coffee and some toast.At 7.30 I put the news on. 8.00am I put my sandwiches on my bike and set off for school.As I cycle the 1.5 mile journey I look at the countryside. School begins at 8.55am and ends at 3.45pm.P.E is my favourite lesson. As soon as I get home I do my homework and then go out to play in Scarthingwell wood until 7.00pm when I have my tea. After tea I usually play out again until 9.30pm when I come in for a wash.After I have had a wash I watch television until 10.00pm when I go to bed. Age: 12. Lives in Barkston Ash.
